mapper.select: SELECT STOCK_SEQ, STORE_CODE, NVL(STOCK.STOCK_NAME,ITEM.ITEM_NAME) AS STOCK_NAME, ITEM_NAME, NVL(STOCK.STOCK_QTY,0) AS STOCK_QTY FROM STOCK FULL OUTER JOIN ITEM ON STOCK.STOCK_NAME = ITEM.ITEM_NAME ORDER BY STOCK.STOCK_NAME

SELECT STOCK_SEQ, STORE_CODE, NVL(S.STOCK_NAME, I.ITEM_NAME) AS STOCK_NAME, ITEM_NAME, NVL(S.STOCK_QTY,0) AS STOCK_QTY FROM (SELECT * FROM STOCK SS WHERE SS.STORE_CODE = #{store_code}) S FULL JOIN ITEM I ON S.STOCK_NAME = I.ITEM_NAME ORDER BY S.STORE_CODE, S.STOCK_NAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STOCK(STOCK_SEQ, STORE_CODE, STOCK_NAME, STOCK_QTY) VALUES(STOCK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{store_code}, #{stock_name}, #{stock_qty})
